newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Prebon, BCMG form Singapore forex options JV.
newsitem.headline: Prebon, BCMG form Singapore forex options JV.

text.p: Prebon Yamane (Singapore) Ltd, a unit of U.S.-based brokerage Prebon Yamane, said on Monday it formed a joint venture with over-the-counter currency options specialist BCMG to broke regional foreign currency options.
The new entity will operate under the name of Prebon Yamane (Singapore) and a team of four brokers is expected to start trading on March 17 in Singapore, it said in a statement.

BCMG's existing yen, mark and Australian dollar options business in Singapore will be directed to its London and New York desks to allow the Singapore team to focus exclusively on regional currency options and exotics, the statement said.
